message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.  I'm confident you'll see it's worth every penny.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 reflects the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $12,000 to make this work for both of us. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. This is a fair price for a product of this value, considering the market conditions.
